title: For the purpose of computation of FSI / built-up area, the net area of the plot shall only be considered
clause_text: For the purpose of computation of FSI / built-up area, the net area of the plot shall only be considered.
section: 3.9 NET PLOT AREA AND COMPUTATION OF FSI
